means: enjoy yourself （祝愿时说）玩痛快些

sentence.Network_en: Countries enjoying surpluses will be under no pressure to revalue their currencies.
sentence.Network_cn: 享有贸易顺差的国家不会面临货币升值的压力。

sentence.Network_en: When we stop enjoying ourselves we'll knock it on the head.
sentence.Network_cn: 等玩够了，我们就会结束。

sentence.Network_en: He asked in his Germanic English if I was enjoying France.
sentence.Network_cn: 他操着一口带有德国腔的英语问我在法国玩得是否愉快。

PerfectNetExp.abs: we belong together , loving forever , enjoying this life ., 我们属于彼此 , 永远相爱 , 享受着这生活.
5A英语语法:现在分词,-enjoying hurry-hurrying ,do-doing , read-reading , think-thinking 2. 如果动词以-e结尾,则去掉-e,再加-ing, 如come-coming.
Maybe he ' s still walking on airs and enjoying his luck ., 也许他还在洋洋得意 , 庆幸自己的好运气呢.
i was rambling , enjoying the bright moonlight ., 漫步欣赏着明亮的月光.

list.abs: 冀教版初中英语单词表 - 豆丁网 ... enjoy v. 喜欢；享受„乐趣 enjoy oneself 过得快乐；玩得痛快 enjoyable adj. 愉快的；有趣的.
新概念英语第二册_百度百科 ... go to + 地点：去某地做相关的事 enjoy oneself 玩得开心 I got angry. （强调变化过程）.
七下英语短语、重点句子 - 豆丁网 ... next to 在……的旁边 enjoy doing sth. 喜欢做某事 keep money 存钱.
邢台婚纱摄影_邢台绝色婚纱摄影 ... Latest work 最新作品 Customers enjoy 客片欣赏 Dynamic news 新闻动态.
高中英语作文 ... 愉快地工作( Happiness at Work) 享受生活( Enjoy Life) 给儿子的信( A Letter to My Son).

entry.def: If you enjoy something, you find pleasure and satisfaction in doing it or experiencing it.

example.ex: Ross had always enjoyed the company of women...
example.tran: 罗斯向来喜欢有女人伴其左右。

example.ex: He was a guy who enjoyed life to the full...
example.tran: 他是个尽情享受生活的人。

entry.def: If you enjoy yourself, you do something that you like doing or you take pleasure in the situation that you are in.

example.ex: I must say I am really enjoying myself at the moment.
example.tran: 我得说此刻我感到非常愉快。

entry.def: If you enjoy something such as a right, benefit, or privilege, you have it.

example.ex: The average German will enjoy 40 days' paid holiday this year...
example.tran: 今年，德国人将平均享受40天的带薪假期。

example.ex: He enjoys a reputation for honesty.

auth_sentence.content: It is the sound of an artist enjoying herself.
auth_sentence.res_content: It is the sound of an artist enjoying herself.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It is the sound of an artist enjoying herself.

auth_sentence.content: It's time-consuming but I am really enjoying it.
auth_sentence.res_content: It's time-consuming but I am really enjoying it.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It's time-consuming but I am really enjoying it.

auth_sentence.content: How was I enjoying my first months in harness?
auth_sentence.res_content: How was I enjoying my first months in harness?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: How was I enjoying my first months in harness?

Sentence.sentence: Some tables will arrive on a Sunday, order a whole chicken and a shoulder of lamb or a baby pig, and just stay for hours enjoying everything we bring out for them.
